definitions.definition: A simple saddle girth used in Mexico .
( informal ) Something that is very easy to do.
( informal ) Something that is obvious or certain to occur; a sure thing .

main_definition: A simple saddle girth used in Mexico .
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) Something that is very easy to do.
( informal ) Something that is obvious or certain to occur; a sure thing .

definitions.definition: ( card games ) A variety of auction pitch in which a draw to improve the hand is added, and the five of trumps (called "right Pedro") and the five of the same colour (called "left Pedro", and ranking between the five and the four of trumps) are each worth five. Fifty-one points make a game.

main_definition: ( card games ) A variety of auction pitch in which a draw to improve the hand is added, and the five of trumps (called "right Pedro") and the five of the same colour (called "left Pedro", and ranking between the five and the four of trumps) are each worth five. Fifty-one points make a game.
( chiefly Europe , technology ) An RCA connector .
